mapper.select: SELECT ORDERID, LINENUM AS lineNumber, ITEMID, QUANTITY, UNITPRICE FROM LINEITEM WHERE ORDERID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LINEITEM (ORDERID, LINENUM, ITEMID, QUANTITY, UNITPRICE) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{lineNumber}, #{itemId}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEMID, I.ATTR1 AS attribute1, I.ATTR2 AS attribute2, I.ATTR3 AS attribute3, I.ATTR4 AS attribute4, I.ATTR5 AS attribute5, P.NAME, LINEQTY AS quantity FROM ITEM I, PRODUCT P, (SELECT ITEMID, SUM(QUANTITY) AS LINEQTY FROM LINEITEM GROUP BY ITEMID) AS T WHERE P.PRODUCTID = I.PRODUCTID AND I.ITEMID = T.ITEMID AND LINEQTY > 0 ORDER BY LINEQTY DESC
